.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_testing_compare_plot_0_compare_classification.py:


Model Comparison: Classification
========================================================

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 8-9

Experiment initialization and data preparation

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 9-19

.. code-block:: default

    from piml import Experiment
    from piml.models import TreeClassifier
    from piml.models import FIGSClassifier
    from piml.models import XGB2Classifier

    exp = Experiment()
    exp.data_loader(data="TaiwanCredit", silent=True)
    exp.data_summary(feature_exclude=["LIMIT_BAL", "SEX", "EDUCATION", "MARRIAGE", "AGE"], silent=True)
    exp.data_prepare(target="FlagDefault", task_type="classification", silent=True)








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 20-21

Train Model

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 21-25

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_train(TreeClassifier(), name="Tree")
    exp.model_train(FIGSClassifier(), name="FIGS")
    exp.model_train(XGB2Classifier(), name="XGB2")








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 26-27

Accuracy comparison with AUC

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 27-28

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_compare(models=["Tree", "FIGS", "XGB2"], show="accuracy_plot", metric="ACC", figsize=(5, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_compare/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_compare_classification_001.png
   :alt: Predictive Performance
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_compare/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_compare_classification_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 29-30

Accuracy comparison with AUC

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 30-31

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_compare(models=["Tree", "FIGS", "XGB2"], show="accuracy_plot", metric="AUC", figsize=(5, 4))

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 36-37

Overfit comparison with historgram slicing

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 37-40

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_compare(models=["Tree", "FIGS", "XGB2"], show="overfit",
                      slice_method="histogram", slice_feature="PAY_1", 
                      threshold=1.05, bins=10, metric="ACC", original_scale=True, figsize=(5, 4))



.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_compare/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_compare_classification_004.png
   :alt: Overfit Comparison
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_compare/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_compare_classification_004.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 41-42

Overfit comparison with tree slicing

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 42-46

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_compare(models=["Tree", "FIGS", "XGB2"], show="overfit",
                      slice_method="tree", slice_feature="PAY_1", 
                      threshold=1.05, metric="ACC", original_scale=True, figsize=(5, 4))

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 55-57

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 58-59

Robustness comparison with custom perturbation features

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 59-61

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_compare(models=["Tree", "FIGS", "XGB2"], show="robustness_perf", perturb_features=["PAY_1"], figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_compare/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_compare_classification_009.png

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 62-63

Robustness comparison on worst alpha-percent samples

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 63-65

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_compare(models=["Tree", "FIGS", "XGB2"], show="robustness_perf_worst", alpha=0.3, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_compare/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_compare_classification_010.png
   :alt: 30%-Worst Sample Performance
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_compare/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_compare_classification_010.png

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 66-67

Resilience comparison with worst-sample scenario

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 67-70

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_compare(models=["Tree", "FIGS", "XGB2"], show="resilience_perf",
                      resilience_method="worst-sample", immu_feature=None, metric="AUC", figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/testing_compare/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_compare_classification_011.png
   :alt: Resilience Test
   :srcset: /auto_examples/testing_compare/images/sphx_glr_plot_0_compare_classification_011.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 71-72

Resilience distance comparison with worst-sample scenario

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 72-74

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_compare(models=["Tree", "FIGS", "XGB2"], show="resilience_distance",
                      resilience_method="worst-sample", metric="AUC", alpha=0.3, figsize=(5, 4))
